title: Strengthening e-Learning Practical Competencies: An Integrated Approach to Physical Education: Enactive Anthropology and Ecological

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods for analyzing students' physical experiences from an enactive anthropological perspective.
Learners can propose concrete strategies for designing physical education environments by applying ecological dynamics theory.
Learners can demonstrate an integrated lesson combining two approaches using the 3E (Exploration, Experience, Empathy) instructional method.
Learners can measure learner engagement and skill acquisition levels using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
